author: Mirae Kim
text:
If you are or had been a government or nonprofit executive, program or unit manager, front-line public servant, or graduate student planning a career in public service – I would like to invite you to the Public Service Research Panel (http://www.PSRPanel.org). 
PSRPanel is an online research panel of public service professionals, who volunteer to participate in web-based studies about the important work they do and the organizations they help lead.  Results of the studies will be published in leading academic and professional journals in the field and contribute to the advancement of the art and science of public administration.  The project has a very strict policy on privacy and voluntary participation and has been approved by the Rutgers IRB. 
To join the panel, or for more information, please visit www.PSRPanel.org
Mirae Kim
Research Associate
School of Public Affairs and Administration
Rutgers University
title: Working in the public/nonprofit sector?
